Posts.Content: Sep 10, 2009 01:51PM Beth2009 wrote: I also had burns & used many of the creams, lotions & cleansers mentioned by this group. The real key to my healing was making sure I used surgical dressings that were Non-stick. That way, healing skin wasn't removed when I changed bandages. The no-bra suggestion also helped -but not with any sense of fashion (BTW a C cup foob & DDD boob are mighty asymmetrical) :)
